Introduction

Mayu is a Japanese singer and dancer under MODHAUS.

On July 19, 2023, Mayu was introduced as the sixteenth member of the girl group tripleS under MODHAUS. She debuted with the sub-unit EVOLution on October 11, 2023 with the mini album "⟡(MUJUK)". Mayu made her debut with tripleS on May 8, 2024, with the album "ASSEMBLE24".

As a member of tripleS, Mayu was placed in the sub-unit EVOLution, and Hatchi!.
